CustomField.inlineHelpText: One of the following special needs factors
CustomField.label: One of following special needs factors

value.fullName: 2)Physical, Mental Or Emotional Disability Or Disease ( Documentation Required)
value.label: 2)Physical, Mental Or Emotional Disability Or Disease ( Documentation Required)

value.fullName: 4) Membership in Sibling Group - List Sibling in Care Eligible For Adoption in Same Adoptive Placement
value.label: 4) Membership in Sibling Group - List Sibling in Care Eligible For Adoption in Same Adoptive Placement

value.fullName: 5) Recognized High Risk of Physical or Mental Disability or Disease ( Explanation Must Be Documented In Case Record)
value.label: 5) Recognized High Risk of Physical or Mental Disability or Disease ( Explanation Must Be Documented In Case Record)

value.fullName: 6) Race Or Ethnicity - Can Only Be In Combination with One of the Above Factors ( 1-5)
value.label: 6) Race Or Ethnicity - Can Only Be In Combination with One of the Above Factors ( 1-5)
